message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $180. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  However, I can't go lower than $160 for it. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140.
